Terms of Service

1. Introduction

Welcome to Univo. This platform allows students to buy, sell, and exchange items with other students. By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Eligibility

This platform is intended only for students. By using the website, you confirm that you are currently enrolled in an educational institution.

3. User Accounts

  • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
  • All information provided must be accurate and up to date.
  • You may not create multiple accounts for misleading or fraudulent purposes.

4. Listings and Transactions

  • Users are responsible for the accuracy of their listings.
  • Illegal, prohibited, or unsafe items are strictly not allowed.
  • All transactions are conducted directly between users.

5. Prohibited Activities

  • Posting false or misleading information
  • Harassment, abuse, or discrimination
  • Attempting to scam or defraud other users
  • Violating any applicable laws

6. Payments

Univo does not handle payments directly. Any payment-related issues must be resolved between the buyer and seller.

7. Limitation of Liability

We are not responsible for any loss, damage, or disputes arising from transactions between users. Use the platform at your own risk.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@univo.com.
